title: illustrative type presents : the Future Sands New Font by Jerry Rose & free
content:
New Font from Jerry Rose of illustrative type. The Future Sands is based off of my mind and the perception of future typefaces. This font is available for free download my online mind [www.illustrativetype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20091012173925/http:/www.illustrativetype.com/ "www.illustrativetype.com"). It will be in vector format.

The Future Sands by [Jerry Rose](http://web.archive.org/web/20091012173925/http:/www.illustrativetype.com/) is licensed under a [Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works 3.0 United States License](http://web.archive.org/web/20091012173925/http:/creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/3.0/us/).

Please do enjoy, and Create : Thy : Dream.

Jerry of  
 [www.illustrativetype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20091012173925/http:/www.illustrativetype.com/ "www.illustrativetype.com")  
 [illustrativetype@gmail.com](mailto:illustrativetype@gmail.com)
